title: FinanceWise AI: Advanced budget planner visuals + 100-question quiz library + 15+ long-form SEO blogs + refreshed theme and dark/green sidebar

requirements.summary: Add advanced Budget Planner insights with a line chart projection, clear pie breakdown, and input-driven guidance on saving/investing/next steps.
acceptanceCriteria: Budget Planner results include a line chart visualization derived from the user’s entered inputs and computed plan data.
Budget Planner results include a pie chart breakdown of expenses/allocations (existing pie chart is acceptable if retained and clearly shown in results).

Budget Planner results include a dedicated guidance area that provides actionable suggestions related to saving, investing, and improving finances, and the content changes in response to different inputs (e.g., risk tolerance, goal type, savings rate).
All user-facing text added/updated is in English.

file_operations.description: Extend the results section to render (1) a Recharts line chart projection (e.g., monthly cashflow/savings trajectory over time based on generated plan data) and (2) a clearly labeled pie chart breakdown (retain existing pie but ensure it is prominent in results). Add a dedicated “Guidance / Next steps” area that explains saving/investing improvements in educational language and varies based on user inputs (riskTolerance, goalType, savings rate, debt/EMI presence, emergency fund level, etc.). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Augment computed budget plan outputs to include time-series values needed for the line chart (e.g., month-by-month savings projection, cumulative savings, and/or net cashflow), derived deterministically from the provided BudgetInputs and existing plan assumptions.

Enhance recommendation/guidance generation to explicitly cover saving, investing for beginners, and actionable next steps. Ensure guidance is educational (not licensed personalized advice) and responds to relevant inputs (riskTolerance, goalType, savingsType/amount, spendingBehavior, debt/loanEMIs, emergencyFund).

Create a small helper to compute the Budget Planner’s projection series used by the line chart (e.g., monthly points, labels, cumulative totals) so BudgetPlanner.tsx can map it directly into Recharts datasets.

requirements.summary: Expand finance quiz question source to 100+ unique questions across required topics and ensure the UI/flow initializes and displays the full total.
acceptanceCriteria: Quiz question source data contains 100+ unique questions with unique IDs and non-duplicated prompts.
The authenticated quiz UI shows totalQuestions >= 100 in the quiz statistics/progress display once initialized.
Questions span the requested topics (saving, budgeting, investing, stock market basics, mutual funds, SIP, emergency funds).
Initialization prompt and any helper text remains accurate (no mention of only 2 questions).
All user-facing text added/updated is in English.

file_operations.description: Replace/expand the quiz question library to at least 100 unique questions with unique IDs and non-duplicated prompts. Ensure broad coverage of saving strategies, budgeting methods, investing for beginners, stock market basics, mutual funds, SIP investing, and emergency funds. Keep all user-facing text in English.

Update the quiz-related query/mutation logic so the quiz initialization and statistics reflect the full 100+ question library (e.g., totalQuestions derived from the expanded source, and question selection iterates the full set). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Ensure local quiz progress initialization, storage, and completion logic properly supports 100+ questions (including asked/remaining tracking and totalQuestions computation consistency).

Confirm all helper/initialization copy remains accurate for 100+ questions and that the progress display uses the initialized totalQuestions value (no lingering references to tiny libraries). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Replace Blogs page content with a 15+ post SEO long-form library (800+ words each) and ensure old problem/solution entries are removed.
acceptanceCriteria: The Blogs page no longer displays the previous short problem/solution entries and instead lists 15+ new posts.
Each blog post is long-form content with 800+ words (measured by rendered text word count, excluding nav/footer).
The 15+ posts collectively cover all listed topics; each post has a clear real-world problem framing and solution-oriented structure.
All user-facing text is in English.
No remnants of the previous blog titles/problems/solutions remain on the Blogs page.

file_operations.description: Replace the current problem→solution card grid rendering with a 15+ long-form post library listing (title, excerpt, topical tags/SEO meta where appropriate) sourced from the new long-form dataset, linking into the existing /blog/$slug route. Remove any rendering of the short problem/solution entries so no old content appears.

Replace current blog metadata/content with at least 15 SEO-focused long-form posts (800+ words each) covering: personal finance, saving strategies, budgeting methods, investing for beginners, stock market basics, mutual funds, SIP investing, and emergency funds. Ensure each post is structured around a real-world problem and practical solutions, and that all user-facing text is English.

Ensure the post rendering view correctly displays the new long-form content, maintains readability with the refreshed theme, and supports featured images and SEO-friendly structure (headings, sections) consistent with 800+ word articles.
Remove the old short problem/solution blog dataset so it cannot be rendered on the Blogs page and no remnants of prior titles/problems/solutions remain.

requirements.summary: Refresh the app theme to remove purple/violet/blue-heavy backgrounds and apply a consistent creative, advanced look across public and authenticated pages.
acceptanceCriteria: Public pages and authenticated pages use the updated background theme consistently (no remaining dominant purple/violet/blue gradient backgrounds on main page containers).
The new theme still preserves readability and contrast for cards, text, and charts.
All user-facing text remains in English.

file_operations.description: Update global theme variables (background/foreground/card/border/chart/sidebar tokens) to shift away from purple/violet/blue-heavy appearance toward a more creative, advanced palette (e.g., charcoal + emerald/green accents). Ensure sufficient contrast for text, cards, and charts.

Update authenticated layout container/background classes so the overall page background aligns with the new theme (remove purple/violet/blue-heavy gradients) while preserving existing layout behavior across desktop and mobile.

Adjust the public Blogs page background/container styling to match the refreshed theme consistently (remove purple/violet/blue-heavy gradients), maintaining readability for long-form content previews.

Adjust the public Blog Post page background/container styling to match the refreshed theme consistently (remove purple/violet/blue-heavy gradients), maintaining readability for long-form article content.
Align Quiz page background/container styling with the refreshed theme (remove purple/violet/blue-heavy gradients) while keeping progress and feedback UI readable.

requirements.summary: Restyle the authenticated desktop sidebar to be dark with green hover effects while preserving navigation structure and active-state clarity.
acceptanceCriteria: Desktop sidebar background is dark (not a violet gradient).
Navigation items show green hover effects (text/background/border or accent), distinct from the active state.
Active item remains clearly distinguishable from hover state.
No changes break mobile navigation behavior.

file_operations.description: Replace the desktop sidebar violet gradient with a dark sidebar style and introduce green hover effects for nav items, while keeping the current navigation list, routes, and active-state clarity. Ensure mobile header/menu behavior remains unchanged.
If needed, refine sidebar-related theme tokens (e.g., --sidebar, --sidebar-accent, --sidebar-primary) to support dark sidebar + green hover accents consistently with Tailwind theme variables.

requirements.summary: Update internal requirement documentation to remove the ‘no quiz changes’ contradiction and allow quiz expansion for this build.
acceptanceCriteria: The internal requirement document `frontend/src/requirements/REQ-10-quiz-no-changes.md` is updated to reflect that quiz content expansion is now required (i.e., it no longer states that no new quiz questions should be introduced).
The updated documentation does not prohibit modifications needed to implement 100+ quiz questions.

file_operations.description: Revise the document to reflect the new requirement that quiz content must be expanded to 100+ questions for this build, removing any instructions that prohibit adding/modifying quiz questions.
